conbody.p: The Object Sizes panel displays, per customer, the percentage of stored objects by size. This is the distribution of total objects stored across different object sizes.

The objects are divided into three size categories:
0 MB to 2 MB
2 MB to 1 GB
> 1GB You can toggle the appearance of the size category by clicking the category. Object sizes category deselected
To display this graphic for all customers, click All. This opens a popup window with an identical graphic with all customers. Use the horizontal scrollbar to scroll through the graphic. Object sizes
